chunk:
isoi Bulgarian Rose Mild Cleansing

Brand: isoi

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Coco Glucoside, Disodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Sodium lauroyl glutamate, Argin, Alcohol Denat., Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract
(Olive) Leaf Extract, Castanea Crenata Shell Extract, Rhus Semialata Gall Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract
